examples.program:
To A and the heirs of his body, then to P.
A has child B.
A dies.
B has child C.
B dies.
C dies.

examples.result: Fee tail in C (limited to A's descendants), remainder in fee simple in P.
examples.program:
To A and the heirs of her body, then to P.
A has child B.
A has child C.
A dies.
B has child D.
B dies.
D dies.

examples.result: Fee tail in B (limited to A's descendants), remainder in fee simple in P.
examples.program:
To A and the heirs of her body, then to P.
A has child B.
A conveys to C for life.
A dies.

To A and the heirs of her body, then to P.
A has child B.
A conveys to C.
